item.title: EPISODE20 - The Jester Show on TalkShoe with The Authors of I DO
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Join me on Wednesday, February 4th 2009 when my special guests will be the authors of "I Do" an anthology of gay romance and marriage stories benefiting Lambda Legal and the fight against California's Prop 8.

item.title: EPISODE17 - The Jester Show on TalkShoe with Justin Scott
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Join Jester and Justin from ItsJustJustin.com as they discuss such serious topics as the importance of douching, dating, flirting, and probably some geek-out over the iphone... who am I kidding? I have no idea what we'll talk about, but I'm sure it will be a good time!

item.title: Post Emergency Room JesterPoo Edition - The Jester Show on TalkShoe
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Hilly is in the house. I just got back from the ER after a bizarre throat swelling incident. Come join us as we talk, drink, and split my prescription of vicodin.
